SEARCH
Package main.services

Class HDBManagerService

java.lang.Object
main.services.HDBManagerService
public class HDBManagerService extends Object
Service class that handles operations related to HDB Managers such as creating, editing, deleting BTO projects, toggling visibility, assigning officers, handling applications and withdrawals, and generating booking reports.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an HDBManagerService with the specified project and file managers.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBManagerService

      public HDBManagerService(ProjectService projectSvc, FileManager fileManager)
      Constructs an HDBManagerService with the specified project and file managers.
      Parameters:
      projectSvc - service to handle project-related logic
      fileManager - utility for file persistence

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public boolean createProject(HDBManager manager, String name, String neighborhood, Date startDate, Date endDate, int twoRoomUnits, int threeRoomUnits)
      Creates a new BTO project managed by the specified HDB manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager creating the project
      name - project name
      neighborhood - neighborhood location
      startDate - application start date
      endDate - application end date
      twoRoomUnits - number of 2-room units
      threeRoomUnits - number of 3-room units
      Returns:
      true if project is successfully created

    • viewAllProjects

      public List<BTOProject> viewAllProjects()
      Returns all BTO projects in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all projects

    • viewOwnProjects

      public List<BTOProject> viewOwnProjects(HDBManager manager)
      Returns a list of projects created by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager whose projects are retrieved
      Returns:
      list of projects owned by the manager

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project, boolean visibility)
      Sets visibility for a project managed by the specified manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the project manager
      project - the project to update
      visibility - new visibility state

    • editBTOProject

      public void editBTOProject(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project, String newName, String newNeighborhood, Date newStartDate, Date newEndDate, int newTwoRoomUnits, int newThreeRoomUnits)
      Edits a project and updates its values both in memory and file.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager modifying the project
      project - the project to edit
      newName - new project name
      newNeighborhood - new neighborhood
      newStartDate - new start date
      newEndDate - new end date
      newTwoRoomUnits - updated 2-room unit count
      newThreeRoomUnits - updated 3-room unit count

    • deleteBTOProject

      public void deleteBTOProject(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project)
      Deletes a BTO project from memory and file.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager deleting the project
      project - the project to delete

    • handleBTOApplication

      public boolean handleBTOApplication(HDBManager manager, Application application, boolean approve)
      Approves or rejects an application under a project managed by the given manager.
      Parameters:
      manager - the approving manager
      application - the application to process
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Returns:
      true if operation was successful

    • handleWithdrawal

      public boolean handleWithdrawal(HDBManager manager, Application application)
      Handles a withdrawal request by updating unit availability and application status.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager processing the withdrawal
      application - the application to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal is processed

    • bookingReport

      public void bookingReport(HDBManager manager, String filter)
      Generates a report of all booked flats filtered by flat type.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager generating the report
      filter - flat type filter (e.g., "2-room")

    • assignOfficerToProject

      public boolean assignOfficerToProject(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Assigns an officer to a project if the manager has control over it.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager assigning the officer
      project - the target project
      officer - the officer to assign
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • removeOfficerFromProject

      public boolean removeOfficerFromProject(HDBManager manager, BTOProject project, HDBOfficer officer)
      Removes an officer from a project.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager controlling the project
      project - the project to update
      officer - the officer to remove
      Returns:
      true if successful
